messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] animal school video
messages.msgSnippet: ... I liked the movie, except the part about the fish.  However, if you go to the website that sponsors this little film, it seems to be a blogg. I also had
messages.messageBody:
On 5/25/06, Melissa <autismhelp@...> wrote:
>
> Awesome little movie, maybe three minutes long, on the internet. It
> talks about the different animals abilities and reflects alot of what
> we see in public schools.


I liked the movie, except the part about the fish. However, if you go to
the website that sponsors this little film, it seems to be a blogg. I also
had some problems with some of her parenting philosophies. The impression
that I got from her blogs were that children are manipulative, difficult and
controlling and shouldn't be spoiled and made to earn their keep. Hmmmmm.
Quite different from the movie.

Michelle





--
Michelle
Independent Kitchen Consultant #413652
The Pampered Chef
850-474-0817

messages.subject: Re: animal school video
messages.msgSnippet: ... I think I must be hormonal. I cried all the way through. It was really good. Thanks Kathleen

> Awesome little movie, maybe three minutes long, on the internet.
